::Feline::

She got the transmission on her link. She gave a deep sigh. "I'=
m 
afraid that walk will have to wait. I'm being called for some 
reason." =
She looked down both ways in the hall. "Umm, where is 
Conference Room 6-3?=
"
She opened her link."I'll be righ there."
